document_data.name: The Moonlight Hostel
document_data.mainbody: '''The Moonlight Hostel''' was a hostel and a soup kitchen located in the [[Ravens Bluff/Crow's End|Crow's End]] neighborhood of [[Ravens Bluff]]in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Services: The Moonlight Hostel was offering food and lodgings to its guests, but its most well-known operation was a charity that provided food for those unable to feed themselves.
document_data.History: The Moonlight Hostel was established by a Living City adventurer only known as [[Drakir Dwarf]], who made a living by aiding the army of the Ravens Bluff and attacking enemy forces during the [[Three Women War]] in the [[Vast]]. In the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, the ''[[Ravens Bluff Trumpeter]]'' reported that The Moonlight Hostel's most recent charity drive raised over 200,000 [[gp]].
